short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This easy and lightweight extension can be used to add a query string to the any url.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of adding query string to the url? This easy and lightweight extension helps you to add a query string to any url. All you need is to turn on the toggle.
